name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifier assigned to the risk assessment.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Business identifier assigned to the risk assessment.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A reference to the request that is fulfilled by this risk assessment.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to the request that is fulfilled by this risk assessment.

name: $parent
desc: Returns: A reference to a resource that this risk assessment is part of, such as a Procedure.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a resource that this risk assessment is part of, such as a Procedure.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the RiskAssessment, using the same statuses as an Observation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the RiskAssessment, using the same statuses as an Observation.

name: $method
desc: Returns: The algorithm, process or mechanism used to evaluate the risk.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The algorithm, process or mechanism used to evaluate the risk.

name: $code
desc: Returns: The type of the risk assessment performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of the risk assessment performed.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The patient or group the risk assessment applies to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient or group the risk assessment applies to.

name: $context
desc: Returns: The encounter where the assessment was performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The encounter where the assessment was performed.

name: $condition
desc: Returns: For assessments or prognosis specific to a particular condition, indicates the condition being assessed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: For assessments or prognosis specific to a particular condition, indicates the condition being assessed.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: The provider or software application that performed the assessment.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The provider or software application that performed the assessment.

name: $basis
desc: Returns: Indicates the source data considered as part of the assessment (FamilyHistory, Observations, Procedures, Conditions, etc.).

name: $addbasis
desc: Indicates the source data considered as part of the assessment (FamilyHistory, Observations, Procedures, Conditions, etc.).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates the source data considered as part of the assessment (FamilyHistory, Observations, Procedures, Conditions, etc.).

name: $prediction
desc: Returns: Describes the expected outcome for the subject.

name: $addprediction
desc: Describes the expected outcome for the subject.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes the expected outcome for the subject.

name: $mitigation
desc: Returns: A description of the steps that might be taken to reduce the identified risk(s).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description of the steps that might be taken to reduce the identified risk(s).

name: $comment
desc: Returns: Additional comments about the risk assessment.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional comments about the risk assessment.
